preferences.name: Description format for session
preferences.description: See `man --pager='less -p ^FORMATS' tmux` for format options. Leave empty for no description

preferences.name: Parameters to append to terminal command if tmux session found
preferences.description: Use %s for session name variable. Avoid or escape double quotes.

preferences.name: Parameters to append to terminal command for new tmux session
Default new session name
preferences.description: Avoid or escape double quotes. Will have a number if it already exists.
